title: From this day on I will no longer be a toxic player.
body:
I must admit, I have a bit of a problem. Either nobody has reported me, or Riot appreciates the steady income they make off me too much but I have never been punished whatsoever - no queue penalty, no chat block, no suspension, no ban. And I want it to stay that way.

I want to make my contributions to threads less negative. I want my own forum content to be more constructive. If someone makes a mistake in-game, I will tell them not to worry about it, not to uninstall or refund their skin. If someone abuses me, I will do my best to tolerate them. If I cannot tolerate them, I will mute them and, if necessary utilize the Report Feature after the game has concluded.

I have been around since Mid-Season 2, I am Platinum and still climbing and I want to remain a member of this game and these forums for as long as my schedule allows it.
